results.definition: having or fostering a warm or friendly and informal atmosphere
examples: the small room was cozy and intimate

results.definition: having mutual interests or affections; of established friendship
examples: pretending she is on an intimate footing with those she slanders

results.definition: concerning things deeply private and personal

examples: the intimate (or sexual) relations between husband and wife
she had been intimate with many men

results.definition: thoroughly acquainted through study or experience
examples: this girl, so intimate with nature

results.definition: someone to whom private matters are confided
marked by close acquaintance, association, or familiarity
examples: intimate relations between economics, politics, and legal principles

results.definition: used euphemistically to refer to the genitals
